|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 4 |rxchains = 4 |sstreams = 4 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |802.11ac = 1733 |802.11n = 600 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5.180~5.825 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = an+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product highlights=== * [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 (CUS239 Reference Design) * 5GHz max 22dBm output power (per chain) * 4x4 MIMO Technology & up to 1.73Gbps * Multi-User MIMO (MU-MIMO) beamformer * MiniPCI Express 2.0 interface * 802.11ac complaint & backward compatible with 802.11a/n * Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Low-density parity check (LDPC), Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), Space Time Block Code (STBC), Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC) * Supports 802.11d/e/h, I/k, RO/v time stamp, and w standards * 802.11ac explicit transmit beamforming (TxBF) and legacy implicit TxBF for both beamformer and beamformee * Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) * Cards are individually calibrated for quality assurance ===Specifications=== The WLE1200V5-22 is a 802.11ac wireless adapter that operates in 5GHz bands, available in MiniPCIe form factor. Featuring QCA9980 chipset (CUS239 reference design), the WLE1200V5-22 increases the overall throughput up to 1.73Gbps with 4x4 MIMO technology. Leveraging the revolutionary technology, WLE1200V5-22 sets a new benchmark in throughput and range, making for consumer and enterprise applications. The WLE1200V5-22 is backward compatible with 802.11a/n and fully supports :industry standards compliant security. ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wle1200v5-22.html|Compex Sample Store] ===Ordering Configuration===

WLE1200V5-CUS239-8A-TE  QCA9980   Wide size   4x4 11ac 5GHz miniPCIe
